CUSOLVERRF modeCUSOLVERRF matrix formatCUSOLVERRF unit diagonalCUSOLVERRF factorization algorithmCUSOLVERRF triangular solve algorithmCUSOLVERRF numeric boost reportOpaque structure holding CUSOLVERRF library commonCUSOLVERRF create (allocate memory) and destroy (free memory) in the handle CUSOLVERRF set and get input formatCUSOLVERRF set and get numeric propertiesCUSOLVERRF choose the triangular solve algorithmCUSOLVERRF set and get fast mode
  • Non-Batched Routines **

CUSOLVERRF setup of internal structures from host or device memory

CUSOLVERRF re-factorization (for parallelism)CUSOLVERRF extraction: Get L & U packed into a single matrix MCUSOLVERRF-batch re-factorization (for parallelism)CUSOLVERRF-batch (forward and backward triangular) solves

Imports

cuComplex, cusolver_common

Types

cusolverRfFactorization_t {.size: 4.} = enum
  CUSOLVERRF_FACTORIZATION_ALG0 = 0, ## default
  CUSOLVERRF_FACTORIZATION_ALG1 = 1, CUSOLVERRF_FACTORIZATION_ALG2 = 2
cusolverRfHandle_t = pointer
cusolverRfMatrixFormat_t {.size: 4.} = enum
  CUSOLVERRF_MATRIX_FORMAT_CSR = 0, ## default
  CUSOLVERRF_MATRIX_FORMAT_CSC = 1
cusolverRfNumericBoostReport_t {.size: 4.} = enum
  CUSOLVERRF_NUMERIC_BOOST_NOT_USED = 0, ## default
  CUSOLVERRF_NUMERIC_BOOST_USED = 1
cusolverRfResetValuesFastMode_t {.size: 4.} = enum
  CUSOLVERRF_RESET_VALUES_FAST_MODE_OFF = 0, ## default
  CUSOLVERRF_RESET_VALUES_FAST_MODE_ON = 1
cusolverRfTriangularSolve_t {.size: 4.} = enum
  CUSOLVERRF_TRIANGULAR_SOLVE_ALG1 = 1, ## default
  CUSOLVERRF_TRIANGULAR_SOLVE_ALG2 = 2, CUSOLVERRF_TRIANGULAR_SOLVE_ALG3 = 3
cusolverRfUnitDiagonal_t {.size: 4.} = enum
  CUSOLVERRF_UNIT_DIAGONAL_STORED_L = 0, ## default
  CUSOLVERRF_UNIT_DIAGONAL_STORED_U = 1, CUSOLVERRF_UNIT_DIAGONAL_ASSUMED_L = 2,
  CUSOLVERRF_UNIT_DIAGONAL_ASSUMED_U = 3

    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Input (in the host memory) Output (in the device memory) CUSOLVERRF-batch update the matrix values (assuming the reordering, pivoting and consequently the sparsity pattern of L and U did not change), and zero out the remaining values. 
proc cusolverRfBatchSolve(handle: cusolverRfHandle_t; P: ptr cint; Q: ptr cint;
                          nrhs: cint; Temp: ptr cdouble; ldt: cint;
                          XF_array: ptr ptr cdouble; ldxf: cint): cusolverStatus_t {.
    cdecl, importc: "cusolverRfBatchSolve", dynlib: libName, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Input (in the device memory)
only nrhs=1 is supported
of size 2*batchSize*(n*nrhs)
only ldt=n is supported
Input/Output (in the device memory)

proc cusolverRfSolve(handle: cusolverRfHandle_t; P: ptr cint; Q: ptr cint;
                     nrhs: cint; Temp: ptr cdouble; ldt: cint; XF: ptr cdouble;

    importc: "cusolverRfSolve", dynlib: libName, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Input (in the device memory)
only nrhs=1 is supported
of size ldt*nrhs (ldt>=n)
Input/Output (in the device memory)
Input
* Batched Routines **
CUSOLVERRF-batch setup of internal structures from host
